}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== A label affixed to the back of the FCC EUT reads "Polaris 3 Chip", "2x2 Installed".
===Additional information, per the FCC 'manual'=== {{802dot11 RxSens|11b |info=PER = 0.08 |1M=-102.5 |2M=-101.5 |5.5M=-100.5 |11M=-97.5 }} {{802dot11 RxSens|11g |info=PER = 0.10 |6M=-99.5 |9M=-97.5 |12M=-94.5 |18M=-93.5 |24M=-89.5 |36M=-87.5 |48M=-82.5 |54M=-81.5
